title: CV
content:
### GIRTEKA – Head of Corporate Communications (2022–)
- Developed corp. comm. strategy, sustainability, AI use
- 300% ↑ social engagement, 2M video reach, 1.8K media mentions

### ROCKWOOL – MarCom & PR Manager CEE (2018–2022)
- Managed all CEE communication
- 10% YoY sales growth, crisis ↓ by 60%, Golden Arrow Award

### ROCKWOOL – PR Manager (2011–2018)
- Strategy, campaigns, stakeholder mgmt.
- 17pp ↑ recognition, 15pp ↑ preference

### BuildDesk – Marketing Manager (2008–2011)
- Built brand from scratch
- Launched SaaS for energy audits
